title: When you queue for support and get support you need to realize that:
body:
Your Marksman expects a support
Your Jungler expects a support
Your Mid expects a support
Your Top expects a support

replies.body: this is about the nunu isnt it
well when i que for support and get support i'm expecting to support my adc and spoon feed them kills or make them child proof
what about when you Q jungle and mid then get auto filled in to support?
Support in no place is said it has to go bot lance it just expected support is a flex role just like jg
